content.rendered: TTE’s core team met to share their strategy for 2022 and discuss insights gained over the past months. The meeting was followed by team building activities on the beach. Held at the Lou’ Lou’a Beach Resort, employees participated in games that require innovation, communication and collective effort. Participants shared their perspective on how team tactics used during the games can be applied to real work situations. An enjoyable afternoon ended with an outdoor team dinner by the pool.
